title: Plot Agglomerative Clustering
description: Agglomerative clustering is a hierarchical clustering algorithm that groups similar data points together. It starts with each data point as a separate cluster and then combines these clusters iteratively based on their similarity until all data points belong to a single cluster. In this lab, we will explore the effect of imposing a connectivity graph to capture local structure in the data.

meta.title: Explore Agglomerative Clustering with Python
meta.description: Learn how to use Agglomerative Clustering to group similar data points in this Python tutorial.
meta.keywords: agglomerative clustering, hierarchical clustering, data analysis, machine learning, python
